channel.title: survival_analysis on Just be-cause
channel.description: Recent content in survival_analysis on Just be-cause

item.title: Better churn prediction
item.description: Image by Mandy Klein from Pixabay First off - I’m excited to share this blog was instrumental in earning me a position as senior data scientist at Loops - a startup that builds an automated analytics platform for product and growth teams. One of it’s primary selling points is the application of advanced causal inference methodologies to uncover opportunities from observational data. This happened a little over a year ago and during that time I’ve been quite busy developing causal inference methodologies for real world applications.
